name: MK WordPress Title
author: Mukesh Kumar

sections.description: MK WordPress Title will easily change the post/page title. You can set your own custom title for each page/post. This is very simple plugin. No use of shortcode or php function or need to edit the theme files. Just install the plugin and it is ready to use.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin under wp-content/plugins/mk wordpress title
  2. Activate it and it is ready to use for you.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin under wp-content/plugins/mk wordpress title
  2. Activate it and it is ready to use for you.

short_description: This plugin will be used to update the page/post title.
description: MK WordPress Title will easily change the post/page title. You can set your own custom title for each page/post. This is very simple plugin. No use of shortcode or php function or need to edit the theme files. Just install the plugin and it is ready to use.
